name: AlternateIKSystem
author: NotAKidoS
description:
Adds VRIK to Desktop avatars. No longer will you be a liveless sliding statue~!
Adds the small feet stepping when looking around on Desktop.

Optional BTKUILib integration.
changelog:
- Fixed IK not being reset when teleporting/respawning/sitting.
- Fixed IK Locomotion not being disabled while sitting.
- Cleanup of VRIK Calibration & Configuration to make updating & debugging easier.
- Added a temporary fix for DesktopVRSwitch BodySystem handling to ensure tracking is correctly enabled after switch.
- Added "NetIKPass" after VRIK solving, which fixes many rotational errors that were only visible on the local client.
- Removed Chest VRIK reference fix & find unmapped toe options as they didn't stream over NetIK.
